column1: To provide a better starting point for mention detection on the ACE corpora
column2: the Carafe pipeline uses an ACE mention tagger provided by MITRE CITATION

column1: Starting out with a chunking pipeline
column2: which uses a classical combination of tagger and chunker
column3: with the Stanford POS tagger CITATION
column4: the YamCha chunker CITATION and the Stanford Named Entity Recognizer CITATION
column5: the desire to use richer syntactic representations led to the development of a parsing pipeline
column6: which uses Charniak and Johnsons reranking parser CITATION to assign POS tags and uses base NPs as chunk equivalents
column7: while also providing syntactic trees that can be used by feature extractors

column1: BART also supports using the Berkeley parser CITATION
